Iddris Sandu bụ onye American entrepreneur mmemme injinia na ihe owuwu dijitalụ Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke spirit labs Inc ụlọ ọrụ akụrụngwa akụrụngwa akụrụngwa ụ
A mụrụ Sandu na Accra, Ghana. Sandu tolitere na Compton, California, tupu o mesịa kwaga Harbor City, California
Ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara na United States mgbe ọ dị afọ 3 ma mụta mmemme kọmputa mgbe ọ dị iri
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na atọ, e nyere ya ọrụ na Google ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Google+ na imewe maka njikọ mmekọrịta ndị ọzọ
N'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, o mepụtara ngwa maka ụlọ akwụkwọ ya nke nyere ụmụ akwụkwọ ntụziaka site n'otu gaa n'otu iji mee njem gburugburu ụlọ akwụkwọ site na iji eziokwu dị elu
Sandu kwadokwara STEM na usoro agụmakwụkwọ ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị.
Sandu rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka imepụta teknụzụ na injinia na ụlọ ọrụ dị ka Boeing, Twitter, Lockheed Martin, Raytheon, Uber, Snapchat na Instagram
Maka Uber, o kere ngwa ngwa ngwa dị ka mmemme ngwanrọ na-achọpụta ngagharị na ọnọdụ onye ọkwọ ụgbọ ala m
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ọdịnaya dijitalụ maka Beyonce, Kanye West, Migos, Travis Scott, Rihanna, Jay Z, na Jaden Smith. N'afọ 2017, ya na Nipsey Hussle jikọrọ aka mepee ụlọ ahịa uwe Marathon na LA.

N'afọ 2021, Sandu guzobere Spatial Labs, ụlọ ọrụ ngwanrọ ngwaike nke dị na Los Angeles. N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2021, Marcy Venture Partnership (MVP) nke Jay-Z guzobere tinyere ego na Spatial Labs. N'afọ 2022, Spatial Labs malitere Gen One Hardwear, nchịkọta uwe a na-etinye na LNQ's proprietary LNQ One Chip, na LN Q Marketplace, ikpo okwu mkpọsa iji zụọ ahịa anụ ahụ na blockchain.

N'afọ 2022, e gosipụtara Sandu na ndepụta Ebony Power 100. N'afọ 2019, ọ meriri ihe nrite Young African Committed to Excellence (YACE) Rising Star na Technology Award na Culture Creators Innovators & Leaders Awards. Ọ nwetakwala asambodo ịja mma site n'aka Barack Obama.
